posts.post_title: Ready to buy --- Kling Hindu, Magee Hindu. ANY grade! (Looking 2/21)
posts.post_content:

Paying above market price for the Magee (portrait). Less than a 3 here also, please.

Paying fair market prices, trading too!



Thank you and God's blessings,
NJ

[url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url]

Chad and I looked religiously and made some connections, but it lead to a dead end. Grateful, C!

Still looking for both.
